member.name: T:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseUtilities
member.summary: Utilities for getting/setting IExtensionElement in a list, used by

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseUtilities.GetExtension(System.Collections.Generic.IList{Google.GData.Client.IExtensionElementFactory},System.Type)
member.summary: Gets the first extension of the givent type.
member.returns: an extension of the correct type or null

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseUtilities.SetExtension(System.Collections.Generic.IList{Google.GData.Client.IExtensionElementFactory},System.Type,Google.GData.Client.IExtensionElementFactory)
member.summary:
Replaces or adds an extension of the given type to the list.
This method looks for the first element on the list of the given type and replaces it with the new value. If there are no element of this type yet, a new element is added at the end of the list.
member.param: type of the element to be added, removed or replaced
new value for this element, null to remove it

member.name: T:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseQuery
member.summary:
Creates a Google Base query Uri.
To create a query, first get the Uri of the feed you want from and then pass it to the constructor.

member.summary: Default constructor.

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseQuery.#ctor(Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseFeed)

member.param: a feed that must have its Feed link set

member.summary: Creates a query for the given feed Uri.

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseQuery.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a query for the given feed Uri string.

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseQuery.ParseUri(System.Uri)

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseQuery.CalculateQuery(System.String)

member.summary: The gb query string.

member.name: P:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseQuery.Content

member.name: T:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseAttributes
member.summary:
Queries, adds and removes google base attributes (Level 3)
This class adds convenience methods to access common Google Base attributes to its super class Level 2

member.name: T:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseAttributeCollectionWithTypeConversion
member.summary:
Typesafe convenience methods for getting and setting google base attributes (Level 2)
This class adds convenience methods for accessing attributes according to their type.

member.name: T:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseAttributeCollection
member.summary:
A convenience class for accessing GBaseAttribute extensions in an atom feed or entry (Level 1).
This class provides simple, but still low-level access to attributes in an atom feed or entry. It's the 1st level of the hierarchy. Subclasses provide more convenient accessor methods with type conversion and accessors for the most common Google base tags.
Everything this object does is access and modify the extension list of the atom feed or entry. It has no state of its own.

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseAttributeCollection.#ctor(Google.GData.Client.AtomBase)
member.summary: Creates an attribute collection and link it to an extension list.
member.param: atom element, usually a feed or an entry.

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseAttributeCollection.#ctor(Google.GData.Client.ExtensionList)
member.summary: Creates an attribute collection and link it to an extension list.
member.param: extension list to be queried and modified

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseAttributeCollection.GetAttributes(System.String)
member.summary: Gets all attributes with a specific name and any type.
member.returns: all attributes on the list that have this name, in order

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseAttributeCollection.GetAttributes(System.String,Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseAttributeType)
member.summary: Gets all attributes with a specific name and a specific type.
member.returns: all attributes on the list that have this name and type (or one of its subtypes), in order

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseAttributeCollection.GetAttribute(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the first attribute with a specific name and any type.
member.returns: the first attribute found or null

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseAttributeCollection.GetAttribute(System.String,Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseAttributeType)
member.summary: Gets the first attribute with a specific name and type.
member.returns: the first attribute found with this name and type (or one of its subtypes) or null

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseAttributeCollection.Add(Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseAttribute)
member.summary: Adds an attribute at the end of the list. The might exist attributes with the same name, type and even value. This method will not remove them.

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseAttributeCollection.Add(System.String,Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseAttributeType,System.String)
member.summary: Adds an attribute at the end of the list. The might exist attributes with the same name, type and even value. This method will not remove them.

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseAttributeCollection.RemoveAll(System.String)
member.summary: Remove all attributes with a specific name and any type. This method is dangerous. You might be better off calling the version of this method that takes a name and type.

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseAttributeCollection.RemoveAll(System.String,Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseAttributeType)
member.summary: Remove all attributes with a specific name and type or on of its subtypes.

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseAttributeCollection.Remove(Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseAttribute)
member.summary: Remove a specific attribute, if it's there.

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseAttributeCollection.Contains(Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseAttribute)
member.summary: Checks whether an attribute can be found in the element. This method looks for an attribute with the exact same name, type and content.
member.returns: true if the attribute exists

member.summary: Removes all Google Base attributes.

member.name: P:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseAttributes.PriceUnits
member.summary:
g:price_unit tag, the unit that corresponds to the price.
For example, if the item costs 10 dollars per kilo, you'd put:
<g:price>10 USD<g:price> <g:price_unit>kg<g:price_unit>

member.summary: g:payment_notes tag

member.name: P:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseAttributes.Application
member.summary:
g:application tag, which describes your application.
This tag is set automatically by this client on all items before they are inserted or updated using the application name passed to the service.

member.name: T:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseAttributeContainer
member.summary: Interface for objects that contain a GBaseAttributes: feeds and entries.

member.name: T:Google.GData.GoogleBase.DateTimeRange
member.summary:
A range with a start time and an end time.
Empty ranges are considered as one single DateTime object by the Google Base framework.

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.DateTimeRange.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary:
Creates a DateTimeRange given a string representation.
The string representation should be <date/datetime> [" " <date/datetime>]
String representations for dates and date/time are accepted. In this case, the start and end dates will be the same and IsDateTimeOnly() will be true.

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.DateTimeRange.#ctor(System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Creates a DateTimeRange with a start and end date/time

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.DateTimeRange.#ctor(System.DateTime)
member.summary:
Creates an empty range, equivalent to a single DateTime.
Use ToDateTime() to convert it back to a DateTime, if needed.

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.DateTimeRange.IsDateTimeOnly
member.summary: Checks whether the range is empty and should be considered as a single DateTime.

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.DateTimeRange.ToDateTime
member.summary: Converts an empty range to a single DateTime object.
member.exception: Thrown if the range is not empty.

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.DateTimeRange.ToString
member.summary: Generates a valid string representation for the DateTimeRange that can later be parsed by its constructor.

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.DateTimeRange.GetHashCode
member.summary: Generates a hash code for this element that is consistent with its Equals() method.

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.DateTimeRange.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Two ranges are equal if their start and end DateTime are equal.

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.DateTimeRange.op_Equality(Google.GData.GoogleBase.DateTimeRange,Google.GData.GoogleBase.DateTimeRange)
member.summary: Comparison based on Equals()

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.DateTimeRange.op_Inequality(Google.GData.GoogleBase.DateTimeRange,Google.GData.GoogleBase.DateTimeRange)
member.summary: Comparison based on Equals()

member.name: P:Google.GData.GoogleBase.DateTimeRange.Start
member.summary: Start time.

member.name: P:Google.GData.GoogleBase.DateTimeRange.End

member.name: T:Google.GData.GoogleBase.Statistic
member.summary:
Individual statistic in Stats (impressions, clicks, page views).
Most of the time, the total is all there is to individual statistics, but there might be sometimes more specific per-source count information.
Such objects are typically accessed through a property of a Stats object.

member.name: T:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseEntry
member.summary:
A Google Base entry.
Google Base entries in the items and snippets feed will contain tags in the g: namespace that can be accessed using .
Entries in the attributes feed will contain objects instead.
Entries in the item type feed will contain objects instead.

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseEntry.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new entry

member.summary: Adds element from the gm: namespace

member.summary: Access the g: tags in this entry.

member.name: P:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseEntry.AttributeHistogram
member.summary: Access the gm:attribute tags in this entry, useful if the current entry is part of the histogram feed, may be null.

member.name: P:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseEntry.ItemTypeDefinition
member.summary: Access the gm:attributs tags in this entry, useful if the current entry is part of the item types feed.

member.name: P:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseEntry.Stats
member.summary: Access the gm:stats tag in this entry. Note that the gm:stats appears only on the customer item feed and only if the parameter content is set to meta or attribute,meta.

member.name: F:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseAttributeType.DateTimeRange
member.summary:
A time range, with a starting and an end date/time, a supertype of DateTime and Date. For example: "2006-01-01T12:00:00Z 2006-01-02T14:00:00Z"
Empty time ranges are considered equivalent to DateTime.

member.summary:
Accesses sub-elements.
Sub-elements are XML elements put inside the attribute tag. Such as: <g:shipping> <g:country>FR</g:country> <g:price>12 EUR</g:price> </g:shipping>
An attribute cannot contain both sub-elements and text (content)

member.name: P:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseAttribute.HasSubElements
member.summary: Checks whether the attribute has sub-elements. You can access sub-element names using the property SubElementSames.

member.name: P:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseAttribute.SubElementNames
member.summary:
The list of sub-elements name, which might be empty.
The sub-elements names are returned in no particular order.
You can get the value of these sub-elements using this[name].

member.name: T:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseService
member.summary:
Google Base service object
Make all accesses through this service object, as it takes care of setting Google Base-specific headers (X-Google-Key). and handles authentication.

member.name: F:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseService.GBaseServiceName
member.summary: Service name identifying Google Base.

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseService.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new service object.
member.param: the name of your application, usually in the format: CompanyOrAuthorName-ApplicationName-ApplicationVersion. This name will be sent when logging in, in the UserAgent header. It will also be used to set the tag g:application of entries inserted and updated by this feed.

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseService.setUserCredentials(System.String,System.String,System.Uri)
member.summary:
Sets user name and password (Programmatic Login), connecting to a specific Uri for authentication.
By default, the uri that is used is: https://www.google.com/accounts/
member.param: Uri used for authentication, instead of the default https://www.google.com/accounts/ClientLogin

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseService.CreateFeed(System.Uri)
member.summary: Replaces the default AtomFeed with a GBaseFeed for the Query Batch operations.

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseService.Query(Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseQuery)
member.summary: Executes a Google Base Query
member.returns: the feed returned by the server

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseService.OnRequestFactoryChanged
member.summary: notifier if someone changes the requestfactory of the service

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseService.Batch(Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseFeed,System.Uri)
member.summary: Takes a given feed, and does a batch post of that feed against the batchUri parameter. If that one is NULL it will try to use the batch link URI in the feed
member.returns: the returned AtomFeed

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseService.Update(Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseEntry)
member.summary: Updates an entry
member.param: An entry with a valid id and content
member.returns: the entry as it has been updated and returned by the server.

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseService.Insert(Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseFeed,Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseEntry)
member.summary: Inserts an entry into a feed.
member.param: a feed object you got from a previous query
the entry to add to the feed
member.returns: the same entry, with a new id, as it has been added into the feed

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseService.Insert(System.Uri,Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseEntry)
member.summary: Inserts an entry into a feed.
member.param: the Uri of a feed, usually created by
the entry to add to the feed
member.returns: the same entry, with a new id, as it has been added into the feed

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseService.GetEntry(System.Uri)
member.summary: Gets a specific entry from the server.
member.param: the Uri of a entry, usually created by
member.returns: the entry

member.name: T:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseFeed
member.summary: Google Base feeds.

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseFeed.#ctor(System.Uri,Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseService)
member.summary: Creates a new feed
member.param: the GBaseService that this feed will be used with.

member.name: P:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseFeed.GBaseAttributes
member.summary: g: tags that have been put directly into the feed.

member.name: T:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseAttributeFilterEnumerator
member.summary: Filters an IEnumerator, ignoring all elements that are not GBaseAttribute objects.

member.name: T:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseUriFactory
member.summary:
Generates Uri for Google Base feeds.
Most applications will use the default factory, which generates Uris that are sent to www.google.com and will not need to create new factories.

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseUriFactory.#ctor(System.Uri)
member.summary:
Creates a new factory that connects to another host, or using another protocol (such as https).
The URIs generated by this factory will all be relative to the given URI. The base URI *MUST* contain /base/ to connect to /base/feeds/snippets, for example.
member.param: base uri to replace the default: http://www.google.com/base/

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseUriFactory.GetItemTypesFeedUri(System.String)
member.summary: Uri of the item types feed for a particular locale.
member.param: locale of the items to consider, for example: en_US, en_GB or de_DE
member.returns: An Uri, usually passed to GoogleBaseQuery() for setting the parameters.

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseUriFactory.GetCustomerItemFeedUri(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the URI of the item feed of another customers (for aggregators)

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseUriFactory.GetCustomerItemEntryUri(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the URI of a specific item in the items feed of a different customer (for aggregators).
member.param: identifier of the customer who owns the item
identifier for the uri, a numerical value
member.returns: an uri to the entry itself, usually passed to the Update or Delete service method.

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseUriFactory.GetItemEntryUri(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the URI of a specific item in the items feed.
member.param: identifier for the uri, a numerical value
member.returns: an uri to the entry itself, usually passed to the Update or Delete service method.

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseUriFactory.GetSnippetEntryUri(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the URI of a specific item in the snippets feed.
member.param: identifier for the uri, a numerical value
member.returns: an uri to the entry itself

member.name: M:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseUriFactory.GetItemTypeEntryUri(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the URI of a specific item type in the item types feed
member.param: locale of the item type, for example: en_US, en_GB or de_DE
member.returns: an uri to the entry itself

member.name: P:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseUriFactory.Default
member.summary: Gets the default factory, which connects to www.google.com

member.name: P:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseUriFactory.SnippetsFeedUri
member.summary: Uri of the snippets feed.
member.returns: An Uri, usually passed to GoogleBaseQuery() for setting the parameters.

member.name: P:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseUriFactory.SnippetsFeedBatchUri
member.summary: Uri of the snippets feed for getting several entries in one request.
member.returns: An Uri, usually passed to GoogleBaseQuery() for setting the parameters.

member.name: P:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseUriFactory.ItemsFeedUri
member.summary: Uri of the items feed for inserting and querying.
member.returns: An Uri, usually passed to GoogleBaseQuery() for setting the parameters.

member.name: P:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseUriFactory.ItemsFeedBatchUri
member.summary: Uri of the items feed for posting batch feeds.
member.returns: An Uri, usually passed to GoogleBaseQuery() for setting the parameters.

member.name: P:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseUriFactory.LocalesFeedUri
member.summary: Uri of the locales feed.
member.returns: An Uri, usually passed to GoogleBaseQuery() for setting the parameters.

member.name: P:Google.GData.GoogleBase.GBaseUriFactory.AttributesFeedUri
member.summary: Uri of the attributes feed.
member.returns: An Uri, usually passed to GoogleBaseQuery() for setting the parameters.
